name: Out for a Drink: A Choose Your Own Adventure Experience
name_original: Out for a Drink: A Choose Your Own Adventure Experience
description: Out for a Drink is a Twine-made Choose Your Own Adventure experience that can be completed in five minutes for less. It is a simple little thing that was born from my frustrations at seeing people (and people close to me) going to bars, eating in restaurants, and just trying to selfishly live in the before times of our current Pandemic-situated world.
